body: Your fiendish traits take the form of a protective scaly skin.
name: Armor of the Pit
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Tieflings/New Racial Rules/Tiefling Feats/Armor of the Pit

sections.body: You gain a +2 natural armor bonus.
sections.name: Benefit

sections.body: If you have the scaled skin racial trait, you instead gain resistance 5 to two of the following energy types that you don't have resistance to already: cold, electricity, and fire.
sections.name: Special
